articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: The Only 'House Of The Dragon' Season 1 Recap You Need To Watch Before Season 2 Tonight - Forbes
articles.description: Here is a recap video for House of the Dragon season 1 before you watch the season 2 premiere on Max tonight.
articles.content:

House of the Dragon returns to HBO as part of a big, big month for TV, which has also brought us The Boys, Bridgerton and more to come. HBO may not be able to perfectly repl… [+1977 chars]
